cause.description:
For those of you who dont know Jacob Varughese, he is one of the nicest, hardest working, and smartest young men I have ever met. He does everything he can to better his life, but his efforts fail. His dad won't help him, so I thought we should. A few dollars here and a few dollars there may not seem like much, but in the end it can get this young man a form of transportation. After this first mission is accomplished, we will branch out to help other kind people who need a hand. ONE LOVE EVERYONE! GOD BLESS
1. love god
2. love people
3. love yourself
cause.name: Get Jacob A New Car
